root.name: Crimson Sea
root.description: Crimson Sea is a 2002 video game released exclusively for the Microsoft Xbox. The game was developed by Koei. The game is a shoot-em-up with some RPG elements incorporated. Crimson Sea puts the player in control of a young man named Sho who works as a private detective. He initially is hired to merely retrieve an item that was lost beneath Grarve, but is promptly drafted into the organization known as IAG (Intelligence Agency of the Galaxy). Sho becomes tasked with leading the unit known as G-Squad and must help do what he can to stop a terrifying threat against humanity known as the Mutons.Other Info1 Player, In-game Dolby Digital 5.1
